amendment.description: Amendment sought to request a GAO study on the economic impact of contract negotiations in order to evaluate the 2014-2015 West Coast ports slowdown and dispute.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 26 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to request a GAO study on the economic impact of contract negotiations at ports on the west coast.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reichert amendment (A067) Failed by recorded vote: 200 - 228 (Roll no. 605).

action.text: Amendment (A067) offered by Mr. Reichert to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
